title: Make Up Queen R
description: Make Up Queen R is a beauty game that challenges players to apply makeup and achieve a specific look that matches the model's appearance. The game typically consists of three stages, each featuring a different model with a distinct makeup style. The gameplay revolves around precision and timing, requiring players to stop the makeup application at just the right moment to replicate the model's makeup accurately. If the makeup doesn't match the desired look, the game ends at that stage.
